original_text: It was hard to believe that someone so beautiful could be real. I was afraid that he might disappear in a sudden puff of smoke, and I would wake up. 很难相信居然真的有这么美丽的人。我害怕他会突然像一缕青烟一样的消失不见，而我就像是做了一场梦一样。 —— 《暮光之城》
